Title: The 2010 World Expo in Shanghai China -- "Educational Wall Charts Entering Primary and Secondary Schools across the Country" Theme Activity
Designer: PRC Education Ministry (中华人民共和国教育部)Xinhua tongxun she (新华通讯社)
Notes: The poster, titled "The Charm of the Venue: 'Foreign Pavilions'” (场馆魅力之“外国馆”), shows the pavilions of Saudi Arabia, Germany, England, Denmark, Russia, Africa joint pavilion (various countries), Mexico, Israel, India, and Australia.The poster was sponsored by the China Minsheng Bank (中国民生银行).
Tags: 中国2010年上海世界博览会
